briefdescription.para: Multithreading implementation of the force computation.

detaileddescription.para: Used by get_acceleration_and_potential to request that the expansion be performed.

briefdescription.para: Multithreading implementation of the expansion computation.
Used by derived class to initialize any storage and parameters.

memberdef.argsstring: (int cur, int next, Component *c, int i, int id)
memberdef.name: multistep_update

briefdescription.para: Execute to begin level shifts for particles.
Execute to finish level shifts for particles.

detaileddescription.para:
The constructor
c0
is the instantiating caller (a Component)
conf
passes in any explicit parameters
Computes the potential, acceleration and density using spherical, Lagrangian shells

Settable parameters:
nsample
is the number of particles per sample for the shell boundary computation.
nselect
is the number of particle intervals in computing the cumulative distribution
